The future projections show a strong weakening of LPS activity in the main genesis region over the BoB and over land immediately to the northwest ( Fig. 1 B and C ). The coarse-resolution CMIP5 model ensemble also shows a weakening of synoptic activity over central India in the RCP8.5 simulations (
SI Appendix, Fig. S3 ), but the poor representation of LPS structure in those models raised questions about their validity for use in projections.
